nodes.text: This raid was a minor skirmish during the Clone Wars. It mainly involved an attempt by the Gotal Noric Gestal and his pirate and slaver gang to capture a number of female Twi'lek staff in the Fungus Pit cantina and sell them into slavery. The attempt failed, however, and the staff members were saved by the Heroes of Cularin and some other patrons in the cantina.
